description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Prawn, Coconut & Banh Pho Pot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Prawn, Coconut & Banh Pho Pot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 baby pak choi, halved or quartered
1 red chilli, finely sliced, plus extra slivers (to garnish)
1 fresh root ginger, peeled and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the shallots, chillies, cinnamon stick, star anise and ginger and cook gently for 2 minutes. Add the lemon grass and stock and bring to a simmer.

Stir in the fish sauce, sugar and prawns and simmer for 56 minutes or until the prawns turn pink and are cooked through. Add the pak choi, coconut milk and lime juice and heat through until the pak choi wilts.

Cook the noodles according to the packet instructions, then drain. Divide the noodles into warm bowls and ladle over the pho mixture. Scatter with slivered red chillies and spring onions and serve immediately.
